header_text:
Downtown [R][W] trains are running express from 34 St-Herald Sq to Canal St.
If your stop is skipped, take an uptown train.
description_text:
What's Happening?
We're investigating a report of an unauthorized person on the tracks near 28 St.

Expect downtown [N][Q] delays while trains share the express track.
